nodes.text: Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon (De Agostini)

Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon is a 2014–2016 magazine published by De Agostini. Each issue provides a piece of a 1:1 replica of the original Millennium Falcon prop used in Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, which also features unique internal details, lighting and movable parts.
